ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately regenerate Energy for one designated ally equal to <unbreak>30%</unbreak> of their Max Energy.
ItemBGDesc: It's said to be "the worst dessert you can eat on Penacony," but as long as you can bear that scrunched-up face, all your worries will be met with a smile.\n\n"So you're the one who made a dessert with unripe bananas and turned it into a hit with a story? Interested in transferring to Fortune Academy?"
